summary: Yep, it\'s finally here, the moment you\'ve been waiting for. This mod changes the textures of many creatures in Skyrim to resemble Pokémon, yes you heard right... Pokémon!
descriptionHtml:
[line]
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/ca5oB1w.png[/img]
[line]
[color=yellow][size=5][font=\"Impact\"][center]Yep, it\'s finally here, the moment you\'ve been waiting for. This mod changes the textures of many creatures in Skyrim to resemble Pokémon, yes you heard right... Pokémon![/center]

[center]You might be wondering, \"What creatures are actually changed in this mod?\" so here is a list of the current creatures changed, you\'re welcome.[/center]

[center]Horse > Girafarig[/center]
[center]Wolf > Arcanine[/center]
[center]Fox > Vulpix[/center]
[center]Black/Snow Wolf > Mightyena[/center]
[center]Hare > Pikachu[/center]
[center]Dog > Growlithe[/center]
[center]Elk/Deer > Sawsbuck[/center]
[center]Mudcrab > Krabby[/center]
[center]Skeever > Rattata[/center]
[center]Storm Atronach > Eggsecute[/center]
[center]Mammoth > Mammoswine[/center]
[center]Cow > Tauros[/center]
[center]Dragon > Charizard[/center]
[center]Falmer > Sableye[/center]

[line]
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/cK1Tp3c.png[/img]
[line]
[center]Installation is simple just use NMM. And if you don\'t have NMM; get it.[/center]
[center]If you don\'t want to download NMM, manual installation is an option. Just drag and drop the data folder into your Skyrim directory, easy peasy lemon squeezy.[/center]

[line]
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/X0SqZKM.png[/img]
[line]
[center]This mod is obviously not compatible with any other mods that change the textures of theses creatures so don\'t expect it to work together with any of those types of mods.[/center]

[line]
[img=center]http://i.imgur.com/osfd17b.png[/img]
[line]
[center]I will most likely be continuing this mod, so if you have any suggestions, post a comment![/center]
[center]I\'m aware that these textures are not the best, this mod is a joke mod, not realism.[/center]
[center]Also, check out my other mods, they\'re alright: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url][/center][/font][/size][/color]
author: billmineface
